text:
A New Beginning

A man contemplates his past, lost in thought.  
He feels a surge of hope.  
"I can change everything now!"  

---  

A shadow of doubt lingers in his mind.  
"What will it cost me?"  
"Will I be strong enough?"  

---  

A spark ignites within him.  
"This is just the beginning!"  
"I will fight for my new life!"

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The page concludes with the idea that the protagonist's journey towards renewal and regeneration marks the beginning of a new story, while the current narrative has come to an end.
